recommendation.summary: MCP 实际应用的标杆产品

people.name: Alex Albert
people.title: Head of Claude Relations

quote.text: MCP is about creating a universal language for AI tools. Instead of every application building custom integrations, MCP provides a standard that lets any AI system work with any tool. It's like USB for AI capabilities.

people.context: Anthropic 开发者日上关于 MCP 的主题演讲
people.why_matters: Alex Albert 是 MCP 的核心推动者，他的 USB 比喻清晰传达了 MCP 的愿景：成为 AI 工具调用的通用标准。

people.name: David Sacks
people.title: Investor

quote.text: MCP could be the most important protocol for AI since the transformer architecture. It solves the tool integration problem that's been holding back agentic AI. Every AI company should be paying attention.

people.context: All-In Podcast 关于 AI 基础设施的讨论
people.why_matters: 作为知名投资人，Sacks 的观点影响了 VC 对 MCP 生态的投资热情，推动了更多创业公司进入该领域。
